forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 67F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 12C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 54F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
